review: I bought this in September. Worked so great i bought one for another TV. Last month, the first one that was connected through a receiver, had jitters in the programming. I wrote Roku and asked them if there had been a firmware upgrade that might have messed something up. A week(!) later I heard back and they said check with Denon. I asked again about upgrades. Four days later they gave me more junk to try. Four days later they said they had a new software version that would fix it. Nope. Three days later they blamed Denon again. By then I had bought an Amazon Fire Stick which works fine. All the time, my Apple TV, also connected right next to the Roku, has worked fine. Customer service only the phone company could love.

review: Have a 5 year old Roku 2 device that has always worked flawlessly. Decided to try the new Stick version for our new big screen TV, but big mistake. It will connect to our wireless network but fails trying to connect to Internet even though all our other wireless devices (including the 5 year old Roku 2) connect no problem
